attributes.action: take steps to build a tunnel linking the UK and the Republic of Ireland
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition urges the Prime Minister to take steps to construct a tunnel underwater between the UK and the Republic of Ireland. The tunnel will be a joint project between the UK and Irish governments and will generate many tens of thousands of jobs in the UK and Ireland. With a high speed rail service  London and Dublin, 550 km apart, would be connected in two and a half hours. This would make such a venture competitive with air travel.

rejection.details: This is a matter for the Irish government and Welsh Assembly.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
